title: Happy (From "Despicable Me 2")
author: Pharrell Williams
lyrics:
[00:02.05] It might seem crazy what I am 'bout to say
[00:05.42] 
[00:07.80] Sunshine, she's here, you can take a break
[00:13.01] I'm a hot air balloon that could go to space
[00:18.85] With the air, like I don't care, baby by the way
[00:23.70] Huh (Because I'm happy)
[00:25.94] Clap along if you feel like a room without a roof
[00:30.42] (Because I'm happy)
[00:31.77] Clap along if you feel like happiness is the truth
[00:36.51] (Because I'm happy)
[00:37.83] Clap along if you know what happiness is to you
[00:42.62] (Because I'm happy)
[00:43.93] Clap along if you feel like that's what you wanna do
[00:50.01] Here come bad news talking this and that (Yeah)
[00:55.74] Well give me all you got, don't hold back (Yeah)
[01:01.68] Well I should probably warn you I'll be just fine (Yeah)
[01:07.80] No offense to you don't waste your time
[01:11.28] Here's why
[01:12.78] (Because I'm happy)
